Art. 4.198. 
Distribution 
The universal legatees and the legatees by universal title who have accepted their legacy, purely and simply or with the benefit of an inventory, are co-partitioners in the succession.
However, the provisions of Title 1, subtitle 8, chapter 2, section 1, relating to the distribution of gifts, do not apply to them unless they are also heirs designated by law.
